value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium

You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts. However, These types of actions are better to be done using Power Query transformations. Fortunately, Power Query is very easy and simple

value.title: Showing Ranking in a Visual in Power BI using RANKX DAX function
value.excerpt: If you want to show the ranking in a Power BI visual, one way is to use a visual that supports that, such as a Ribbon chart.
